scenario_description: Jonathan dressed up in a formal attire before leaving the house. When he came into the building, the leader showed him where to go. He came into the conference room. The organization was discussing new ideas for an upcoming project. The conference became successful when we developed an agenda.

occ_emotion: Interest2, Interest2_complete, Joy, Networking, Jonathan feels pleased or joyful after networking with Alex about potential collaborations for future projects.
emotion_condition: Neutral, Neutral, None, None, "Jonathan is not feeling any specific emotion before speaking about his project."
Listen(Jonathan, Organization), Listen, None, None, "Jonathan listens to the organization."
Propose_ideas(Jonathan, Organization), Hope, None, None, "Jonathan proposes his ideas."
ContributeToAgenda(Jonathan, Organization), Pride, None, None, "Jonathan feels proud about contributing to the agenda."
Collaborate(Jonathan, Organization), Happy-for, None, None, "Jonathan is happy for the potential collaboration."
Speak(Interest2, Networking, Relief, None), Relief, None, None, "Jonathan feels relieved about discussing potential collaborations with Alex."

occ_emotion: Action, Action, Joy, None, "Jonathan feels joy as he successfully made a new connection and discussed potential collaborations with Alex."
Speak(ConnectionMade, End, None, None), None, None, Joy, None
emotion_condition: Collaborate(ConnectionMade, End, Joy, None, "Jonathan is pleased to have found a potential collaboration partner.")

action_plan: Notify(Leader, Jonathan, "Welcome him and show him to the conference room")
Inform(Leader, Organization, "We will start the meeting now")
Facilitate(Leader, Organization, "Brainstorm ideas for the project")
Synthesize(Leader, Organization, "Develop an agenda for the upcoming project")
Conclude(Leader, Organization, "Thank everyone for their contributions and adjourn the meeting")

Speak(Greeting, Guidance, None, None), Guidance, Joy, None
